folder.name: Orion
folder.tiptext: Orion is a particle system on par with Pulse or FLINT.

string.name: addEmitter
string.tiptext: Add an emitter to the particle system.

string.name: removeAllParticles
string.tiptext: Remove all particles from all emitters in the system.

string.name: removeEmitter
string.tiptext: Remove an emitter from the particle system.

string.name: start
string.tiptext: Starts up all emitters that are enabled.

string.name: stop
string.tiptext: Stops all emitters and animation.

string.name: particleCount
string.tiptext: Returns the total number of particles in the system.

string.name: currentTime
string.tiptext: The current time used by Orion.

string.name: previousTime
string.tiptext: The time from the last cycle.

folder.name: Particle
folder.tiptext: The Particle class stores all the data pertaining to a given particle.

string.name: getColorTransform
string.tiptext: Get a new color transform based on the set color.

string.name: active
string.tiptext: Whether the particle is active and in use or not.

string.name: currentFrame
string.tiptext: The current frame of the target moveclip.

string.name: mass
string.tiptext: The mass of the particle. The higher the mass the harder it is for it to be moved.

string.name: radius
string.tiptext: The radius of the particle, used for the collision filter.

string.name: velocity
string.tiptext: The total velocity of the particle.

string.name: angularVelocity
string.tiptext: The spinning or angular velocity of the particle.

string.name: timeStamp
string.tiptext: A time stamp of the particle, used to determine the lifespan of the particle.

string.name: target
string.tiptext: The actual sprite used for display.

string.name: alpha
string.tiptext: The target's alpha.

string.name: color
string.tiptext: Gets or sets the color/tint of the particle.

string.name: height
string.tiptext: The target's height.

string.name: rotation
string.tiptext: The target's rotation.

string.name: scaleX
string.tiptext: The target's X scale.

string.name: scaleY
string.tiptext: The target's Y scale.

string.name: width
string.tiptext: The target's width.

string.name: x
string.tiptext: The target's X coordinate.

string.name: y
string.tiptext: The target's Y coordinate.

folder.name: BurstOutput
folder.tiptext: The BurstOutput class adds the specified number of particles all at once.

string.name: reflect
string.tiptext: Returns the class name

string.name: reset
string.tiptext: To have the particles emitted again, call this method

string.name: update
string.tiptext: Controls the output of the particles of the emitter

string.name: particles
string.tiptext: The number of particles to be outputted

folder.name: FunctionOutput
folder.tiptext: The FunctionOutput class emits particles based on the given function.

string.name: reflect
string.tiptext: Returns the class name

string.name: update
string.tiptext: Controls the output of the particles of the emitter

string.name: callback
string.tiptext: The function used to control the output

folder.name: KeyDownOutput
folder.tiptext: The KeyDownOutput class outputs particles if the specified key is pressed on the keyboard.

string.name: reflect
string.tiptext: Returns the class name

string.name: update
string.tiptext: Controls the output of the particles of the emitter

string.name: target
string.tiptext: The target to attach the keyboard listener to

folder.name: TimedOutput
folder.tiptext: The TimedOutput class outputs particles for a specified amount of time.

string.name: reflect
string.tiptext: Returns the class name

string.name: reset
string.tiptext: To have the particles emitted again, call this method

string.name: update
string.tiptext: Controls the output of the particles of the emitter

string.name: duration
string.tiptext: The duration that the particles are outputted

folder.name: SteadyOutput
folder.tiptext: The SteadyOutput class outputs particles at a predictable rate.

string.name: reflect
string.tiptext: Returns the class type

string.name: update
string.tiptext: Controls the output of the particles of the emitter

folder.name: BitmapRenderer
folder.tiptext: The BitmapRenderer actually draws the particles and all the animations as a single bitmap.

string.name: addFilter
string.tiptext: Allows you to add a bitmap filter to the renderer

string.name: addParticle
string.tiptext: Adds the particle to the renderer

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Clears the renderer

string.name: getFilters
string.tiptext: Gets all the filters that are being added to the bitmap at each render

string.name: getPalletteMap
string.tiptext: Gets the palletemap if it was set

string.name: getPostFilters
string.tiptext: Gets all the post filters that are being added to the bitmap at each render

string.name: removeFilter
string.tiptext: Removes a filter from the renderer

string.name: removeParticle
string.tiptext: Removes the particle from the renderer

string.name: render
string.tiptext: Calls the renderer to draw the particles

string.name: setPalletteMap
string.tiptext: Remaps the color channel values in an image

string.name: update
string.tiptext: Redraws the particles according to the render type

string.name: pixelSnapping
string.tiptext: Controls whether or not the Bitmap object is snapped to the nearest pixel

string.name: smoothing
string.tiptext: Controls whether or not the bitmap is smoothed when scaled

folder.name: PixelRenderer
folder.tiptext: The PixelRenderer class acts exactly like the BitmapRenderer class except it uses pixels for the particles.

folder.name: DisplayObjectRenderer
folder.tiptext: The DisplayObjectRenderer handles the particles how normal animation is handled in flash.

string.name: addParticle
string.tiptext: Adds the particle to the renderer

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Clears the renderer

string.name: removeParticle
string.tiptext: Removes the particle from the renderer

string.name: render
string.tiptext: Calls the renderer to draw the particles

string.name: update
string.tiptext: Redraws the particles according to the render type

string.name: ParticleEvent
string.tiptext: The constructor function for the ParticleEvent class.

string.name: clone
string.tiptext: Duplicates an instance of an Event subclass.

string.name: UPDATE
string.tiptext: The ParticleEvent.UPDATE constant defines the value of the type property of an update event object.

string.name: DESTROY
string.tiptext: The ParticleEvent.DESTROY constant defines the value of the type property of an destroy event object.

string.name: position
string.tiptext: The current position of the particle.

string.name: scale
string.tiptext: The current scale of the particle.

string.name: velocity
string.tiptext: The current velocity of the particle.

folder.name: WrapEdgeFilter
folder.tiptext: The WrapEdgeFilter makes a particle 'wrap', and appear at the opposite edge once it's hit the edge of the canvas.

string.name: applyFilter
string.tiptext: Applies the specified filter to a particular particle.

folder.name: StopEdgeFilter
folder.tiptext: The StopEdgeFilter makes a particle stop all motion once it's hit the edge of the canvas.

string.name: applyFilter
string.tiptext: Applies the specified filter to a particular particle.

folder.name: BounceEdgeFilter
folder.tiptext: The BounceEdgeFilter forces a given particle to rebound off any edges of the canvas.

string.name: applyFilter
string.tiptext: Applies the specified filter to a particular particle.

folder.name: Emitter
folder.tiptext: The Emitter class is the hub of particle system.

string.name: addFilter
string.tiptext: Adds a filter to apply it's settings to the particles of the emitter

string.name: emit
string.tiptext: Causes the emitter to add particles

string.name: getCanvas
string.tiptext: Gets the canvas used internally by the Emitter

string.name: getEdgeFilter
string.tiptext: Gets the current edge fitler

string.name: getFilters
string.tiptext: Gets the filters being applied by the emitter

string.name: onUpdate
string.tiptext: Sets an update emitter

string.name: onDestroy
string.tiptext: Sets an destroy emitter

string.name: getParticles
string.tiptext: Gets all the particles in the emitter's system currently

string.name: removeAllParticles
string.tiptext: Removes all particles from the emitter

string.name: removeFilter
string.tiptext: Removes a filter from the emitter

string.name: renderAll
string.tiptext: Updates all the particles and positions

string.name: setEdgeFilter
string.tiptext: Sets the edge filter used by the emitter

string.name: setRenderer
string.tiptext: Sets the renderer used by the emitter

string.name: setSize
string.tiptext: Sets the dimensions of the Emitter

string.name: updateCanvas
string.tiptext: Causes the canvas dimensions to be updated

string.name: lifeSpan
string.tiptext: The lifespan of the particle in milliseconds

string.name: mass
string.tiptext: The mass of a particle

string.name: opacity
string.tiptext: The initial alpha of a particle

string.name: opacityMin
string.tiptext: The minimum alpha in a range for the particle randomly initially

string.name: opacityMax
string.tiptext: The maximum alpha in a range for the particle randomly initially

string.name: velocityX
string.tiptext: The initial X velocity of a particle

string.name: velocityXMin
string.tiptext: The minimum X velocity in a range to move the particle randomly initially

string.name: velocityXMax
string.tiptext: The maximum X velocity in a range to move the particle randomly initially

string.name: velocityY
string.tiptext: The initial Y velocity of a particle

string.name: velocityYMin
string.tiptext: The minimum Y velocity in a range to move the particle randomly initially

string.name: velocityYMax
string.tiptext: The maximum Y velocity in a range to move the particle randomly initially

string.name: velocityRotate
string.tiptext: The initial spinning velocity of a particle

string.name: velocityRotateMin
string.tiptext: The minimum spin in a range to spin the particle randomly initially

string.name: velocityRotateMax
string.tiptext: The maximum spin in a range to spin the particle randomly initially

string.name: velocityAngle
string.tiptext: The direction the particle will move in

string.name: velocityAngleMin
string.tiptext: The minimum angle in a range to move in a random direction

string.name: velocityAngleMax
string.tiptext: The maximum angle in a range to move in a random direction

string.name: rotate
string.tiptext: The initial rotation of a particle

string.name: rotateMin
string.tiptext: The minimum rotation in a range to rotate the particle randomly initially

string.name: rotateMax
string.tiptext: The maximum rotation in a range to rotate the particle randomly initially

string.name: scale
string.tiptext: The initial scale of a particle

string.name: scaleMin
string.tiptext: The minimum scale in a range to scale the particle randomly initially

string.name: scaleMax
string.tiptext: The maximum scale in a range to scale the particle randomly initially

string.name: color
string.tiptext: The initial tint of a particle

string.name: colorMin
string.tiptext: The minimum color in a range to tint the particle randomly initially

string.name: colorMax
string.tiptext: The maximum color in a range to tint the particle randomly initially

string.name: selectRandomFrame
string.tiptext: If a frame is randomly selected initially

string.name: enabled
string.tiptext: Whether the emitter is active and running.

string.name: numberOfParticles
string.tiptext: How many particles are emitted during each emit() call

string.name: output
string.tiptext: The output class used

string.name: pixelSnapping
string.tiptext: Whether PixelSnapping is active when using frame caching

string.name: renderer
string.tiptext: The renderer used

string.name: smoothing
string.tiptext: Whether bitmap smoothing is active when using frame caching

string.name: useCacheAsBitmap
string.tiptext: Whether bitmap caching is enabled on particles

string.name: useFrameCaching
string.tiptext: Whether frame caching is enabled

string.name: particleBlendMode
string.tiptext: The blend mode applied to particles when they are created

string.name: cacheTarget
string.tiptext: The frame cache movieclip

string.name: container
string.tiptext: The containining display object that will hold the particles

string.name: destroyEmitter
string.tiptext: A reference to the emitter set for onDestroy

string.name: frameCache
string.tiptext: The storage location for frames that are cached

string.name: height
string.tiptext: The height of the emitter, setting is disabled.

string.name: particleCount
string.tiptext: The current particle count for this emitter

string.name: spriteClass
string.tiptext: The specific library linkId (class reference)

string.name: updateEmitter
string.tiptext: A reference to the emitter set for onUpdate

string.name: width
string.tiptext: The width of the emitter, setting is disabled

string.name: x
string.tiptext: The x coordinate of the interal point used

string.name: y
string.tiptext: The y coordinate of the interal point used

folder.name: MouseEmitter
folder.tiptext: The MouseEmitter class emits particles from the mouse.

string.name: onlyOnMouseMove
string.tiptext: Only emit particles when the user moves their mouse

folder.name: RectangleEmitter
folder.tiptext: The RectangleEmitter class emits particles within a set bounding box.

string.name: isContained
string.tiptext: Whether the particles generated within the box have stay inside the box or not

folder.name: DisplayObjectEmitter
folder.tiptext: The RectangleEmitter class emits particles within a set bounding box.

string.name: assignParticles
string.tiptext: Assigns a particle or the container of the particles to the emitter

string.name: offSet
string.tiptext: This offset is used by the BitmapRenderer to fix render issues

folder.name: BitmapEmitter
folder.tiptext: The BitmapEmitter class emits particles where ever the specified color is on the parent of the emitter.

string.name: updateBitmap
string.tiptext: Updates the snapshot/bitmapdata of the target display object if it has changed

string.name: isRandom
string.tiptext: If true, it ignores speedX and speedY and randomly chooses a point within the emitter

string.name: speedX
string.tiptext: The X speed that the emitter scans the bitmap and adds particles

string.name: speedY
string.tiptext: The Y speed that the emitter scans the bitmap and adds particles

string.name: targetColor
string.tiptext: The target color to attach particles to within the bitmap

string.name: target
string.tiptext: The display object to use as a reference for the bitmapdata
